name: Lander (itch) (danhedges)
description:
This is a small "Lunar Lander" style game. I have not created anything in Unity for a while, so this project is just  a way of refreshing my memory! It was completed over the course of a week or so in the evenings, taking probably around 10 - 12 hours over all. 

Play is simple, space bar fires the rocket, don't run out of fuel and don't crash! Scores are awarded for how gently you land (a gentler landing gives a better score). You are given progressively less fuel and the start altitude becomes higher, see how high you can score before you crash!
